entities.name: harry potter
entities.description: The main character of the story, mentioned as having an argument with his Keeper.

entities.name: luna
entities.description: A person who is present at the scene and comments on Harry's argument.

entities.name: cadwallader
entities.description: A Hufflepuff player who scores a goal.

entities.name: mclaggen
entities.description: The Keeper who is being criticized by Harry and Ginny.

entities.name: ginny
entities.description: A person who allows the Quaffle to be taken out of her possession.

entities.name: professor mcgonagall
entities.description: A professor who corrects Luna's mistake about Cadwallader's name.

entities.name: hufflepuffs
entities.description: The team that Cadwallader is a part of.

entities.name: quaffle
entities.description: A ball used in the game being played.

entities.name: snitch
entities.description: A ball that is supposed to be found by Harry.

entities.name: keeper
entities.description: The position held by McLaggen in the game.

relationships.description: Harry is having an argument with his Keeper, McLaggen.
Luna is corrected by Professor McGonagall about Cadwallader's name.
McLaggen is criticizing Ginny for allowing the Quaffle to be taken out of her possession.
Cadwallader is a member of the Hufflepuff team.
McLaggen holds the position of Keeper in the game.
